text: allaah vahee hai, jisane aakaashon ko aise sahaaron ke bina ooncha kiya hai, jinhen tum dekh sako. phir arsh (sinhaasan) par sthir ho gaya tatha soory aur chaand ko niyamabadhd kiya. sab ek nirdhaarit avadhi ke lie chal rahe hain. vahee is vishv kee vyavastha kar raha hai, vah nishaaniyon ka vivaran (byora) de raha hai, taaki tum apane paalanahaar se milane ka vishvaas karo
